schedule: Puerto Montt - Port Raúl Marín Balmaceda
zone: Región Aysén del General Carlos Ibáñez del Campo
circumstances: The pilot departed Puerto Montt at 0900LT on a positioning flight to Port Raúl Marín Balmaceda to pick up five passengers. On approach, the pilot decided to complete a loss pass to evaluate the landing conditions and the wind component. Shortly later, the aircraft landed on its belly and slid for few dozen metres before coming to rest in a grassy area. The pilot was uninjured and the aircraft was damaged beyond repair.
probable_cause: The pilot forgot to lower the landing gear prior to landing.
